title: Sigaalow: Town of dust
creator_credit: Leslie Jenkins, Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and United Nations
brief_description: Examines the problems relating to living conditions faced by Somalian refugees from the Ogaden. Shows the efforts being made by the Somali government to deal with these problems and the need for International Aid.
creator_credit_for_label: Leslie Jenkins, Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and United Nations
